channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983

item.title: CVE-2022-26452|2024-08-03T05:03:33.054Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983
item.description: In isp, there is a possible use after free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07262305; Issue ID: ALPS07262305.

item.title: CVE-2022-26450|2024-08-03T05:03:32.667Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983
item.description: In apusys, there is a possible use after free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07177801; Issue ID: ALPS07177801.

item.title: CVE-2022-26449|2024-08-03T05:03:32.812Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983
item.description: In apusys, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07177810; Issue ID: ALPS07177810.

item.title: CVE-2022-21788|2024-08-03T02:53:36.268Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983
item.description: In scp, there is a possible undefined behavior due to incorrect error handling. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06988728; Issue ID: ALPS06988728.
